control.name: btnGenerateDataSource
control.description: Generates a large database with the specified number of records and establishes a connection to it.

control.name: lcTimeTaken
control.description: Shows the time (in milliseconds) expended to the last data-aware operation.

control.name: panelFieldCust
control.description: The Customization Form allows end-users to customize the pivot grid layout by hiding and rearranging fields.
